title: Anne-Marie looks at Ant McPartlin with love as they join Dec for Newcastle game
text:

Ant McPartlin brought his love Anne-Marie Corbett to watch his home team Newcastle take on Chelsea.

The I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here presenter got his girlfriend to support the Magpies alongside his long-time BFF Dec Donelly.

However, the close trio watched on nervously as Steve Bruce's Newcastle lost 1-0 to Chelsea.

Anne-Marie, however, was preoccupied with giving her attention to her beau as she showered him with her affection.

The PR powerhouse shot a look of love at her man while they gave Newcastle a standing ovation during the hotly-anticipated game.

(Image: Action Images via Reuters)

(Image: PA)

Emotional Dec covered his eyes mid-way through the game, yet he still managed to crack a smile.

The presenting pair put on a very animated display when they discussed team tactics throughout the game.

However, they were left disappointed when Newcastle lost the match.

(Image: Action Images via Reuters)

(Image: Action Images via Reuters)

The Premier League match game took place at Stamford Bridge, in London.

Ant and Dec are long-time Newcastle supporters and often make the trips to watch their games.

In June before Bruce was appointed the manager, the pair launched a scathing attack on Mike Ashley to "get out" of the club.

(Image: PA)

They shared their fury after well-loved manager Rafa Benitez departed from the Magies.

The popular manager left when he failed to agree new terms with controversial owner Mike after his contract came to an end.

Ant and Dec wrote on their joint Twitter : "Disastrous. Those ‘at the top’ of our great club should be ashamed. The great shame is that they won’t be.

"The way they are repeatedly able to snatch defeat from the jaws of victory is astonishing.



"Thank you @rafabenitezweb . Mike Ashley - get out of OUR club."
description: Ant and Dec are long-time Newcastle supporters and often make the trips to watch their games
